label: accuracy
comment: A percentage represented as a numeric between 0 and 1 indicating the rage of accuracy of the claimed value (eg 0.05 means that the actual value is within 5% of the claimed value.)

domainIncludes.comment: A specific measure of performance against the criteria that governs the claim.  Expressed as an array of metric (ie unit of emasure) / value (ie the actual numeric value) pairs.
